data.title: Code Signatories
data.meta_description: The sport organizations within the following categories have
data.text:
The sport organizations within the following categories have accepted the Code:

Use the Summary to navigate through the sections:

International Federations (IFs)

Major Event Organizations (MEOs)

National Olympic Committees (NOCs)

National Paralympic Committees (NPCs)

National Anti-Doping Organizations (NADOs)

Other organizations having significant relevance in sport

INTERNATIONAL FEDERATIONS (IF)

IFs within the Olympic / Paralympic Movement

Within the Olympic Movement

ASOIF members

(Assoc. of Summer Olympic International Federations)

Badminton World Federation (BWF)

International Basketball Federation (FIBA)

International Canoe Federation (ICF)

International Cycling Union (UCI)

International Equestrian Federation (FEI)

International Federation of Sport Climbing (IFSC)

International Fencing Federation (FIE)

International Football Federation (FIFA)

International Golf Federation (IGF)

International Gymnastics Federation (FIG)

International Handball Federation (IHF)

International Hockey Federation (FIH)

International Judo Federation (IJF)

International Modern Pentathlon Federation (UIPM)

International Shooting Sport Federation (ISSF)

International Surfing Association (ISA)

International Table Tennis Federation (ITTF)

International Tennis Federation (ITF)

International Volleyball Federation (FIVB)

International Weightlifting Federation (IWF)

United World Wrestling (UWW)

World Aquatics

World Archery (WA)

World Athletics (ex-IAAF)

World Rowing (ex-FISA)

World Rugby (WR)

World Sailing (WS)

World Skate (WSK)

World Taekwondo (WT)

World Triathlon (ex-ITU)

ARISF members

(Assoc. of IOC Recognized International Sports Federations)

Federation of International Bandy (FIB)

Federation of International Polo (FIP)

International Orienteering Federation (IOF)

International Racquetball Federation (IRF)

International Sambo Federation (FIAS)

International Ski Mountaineering Federation (ISMF)

International Sumo Federation (IFS)

International Union of Powerboating (UIM)

International Waterski & Wakeboard Federation (IWWF)

International Wushu Federation (IWUF)

Tug of War International Federation (TWIF)

World Air Sports Federation (FAI)

World Association of Kickboxing Organizations (WAKO)

World Baseball Softball Confederation (WBSC)*

World Boules & Petanque Federation (WBPF)

World Bridge Federation (WBF)

World Chess Federation (FIDE)

World Confederation of Billiards Sports (WCBS)

World Dance Sport Federation (WDSF)*

World Flying Disc Federation (WFDF)

World Karate Federation (WKF)*

World Lacrosse (WL)

World Squash Federation (WSF)

World Netball

World Underwater Federation (CMAS)

AIMS members

(Alliance of Independent Recognized Members of Sport)

International Aikido Federation (IAF)

International Casting Sport Federation (ICSF)

International Dragon Boat Federation (IDBF)

International Fitness and Bodybuilding Federation (IFBB)⁷

International Federation of Sleddog Sports (IFSS)

International Fistball Association (IFA)

International Go Federation (IGF)

International Kendo Federation (FIK)

International Powerlifting Federation (IPF)

International Practical Shooting Confederation (IPSC)

International Savate Federation (FISav)

International Sepaktakraw Federation (ISTAF)

International Soft Tennis Federation (ISTF)

International Sport Fishing Confederation (CIPS)

International Teqball Federation (FITEQ)

Ju-Jitsu International Federation (JJIF)

World Armwrestling Federation (WAF)

World Darts Federation (WDF)

World Draughts Federation (FMJD)

World Minigolf Sport Federation (WMF)

WOF members

(Winter Olympic Federations)

International Biathlon Union (IBU)

International Bobsleigh & Skeleton Federation (IBSF)

International Ice Hockey Federation (IIHF)

International Luge Federation (FIL)

International Skating Union (ISU)

International Ski and Snowboard Federation (FIS)

World Curling Federation (WCF)

Other

International Committee of Sports for the Deaf (ICSD)⁰

Within the Paralympic Movement

Boccia International Sports Federation (BISFed)

International Blind Sports Federation (IBSA)⁰

International Federation of Cerebral Palsy Football (IFCPF)

International Paralympic Committee (IPC)⁰

International Sports Federation for Athletes with an Intellectual Impairment (VIRTUS)

International Wheelchair Basketball Federation (IWBF)

World Abilitysport⁰

World Wheelchair Rugby (WWR)

World ParaVolley (WPV)

IFs outside the Olympic / Paralympic Movement

International Boxing Association (IBA)

International Pole Sports Federation (IPSF)

International Taekwon-Do Federation (Austria) (ITF)

International Taekwon-Do Federation (Switzerland) (ITF)

International Union of Kettlebell Lifting (IUKL)

International Esports Federation (IESF)

International Federation of Cheerleading (IFC)

International Jump Rope Union (IJRU)

International Kurash Association (IKA)

International Mixed Martial Arts Federation (IMMAF)

International Rafting Federation (IRaFt)

International Table Soccer Federation (ITSF)

Kudo International Federation (KIF)

World Bowls

World Dodgeball Association (WDA)

World Karate Organization (WKO)

Notes:

An International Federation marked with * is also an ASOIF associate-members.

International Federations marked with ⁰ are also Major Event Organizations as they govern some sports but also organize Major Events in which the majority of participants are governed by other International Federations.

An organization marked with ⁷ is currently declared non-compliant with the Code.

MAJOR EVENT ORGANIZATIONS (MEO)

MEOs within the Olympic / Paralympic Movement

Within the Olympic Movement

Association of National Olympic Committees (ANOC)

Association of National Olympic Committees of Africa (ANOCA)

Centro Caribe Sports (CCS)

Australian Commonwealth Games Association

CGA of Gibraltar

Commonwealth Games Canada

Commonwealth Games Council for Wales

International Masters Games Association (IMGA)

International Military Sports Council (CISM)

International Olympic Committee (IOC)

International School Sport Federation (ISF)

International University Sports Federation (FISU)

International Workers Sports Confederation (CSIT)

International World Games Association (IWGA)

Olympic Council of Asia (OCA)

Pacific Games Council (PGC)

Pan American Sports Organization (Panam Sports)

South American Sports Organization (ODESUR)

SportAccord

World Martial Arts Masterships Committee (WMC)

World Transplant Games Federation (WTGF)

Within the Paralympic Movement

Asian Paralympic Committee (APC)

International Blind Sports Federation (IBSA)²

International Paralympic Committee (IPC)²

World Abilitysport ²

MEOs outside the Olympic / Paralympic Movement

African Union Commission

Comité International des Jeux de la Francophonie (CIJF)

International Mind Sports Association (IMSA)

Organización Deportiva Bolivariana (ODEBO)

Union of Arab National Olympic Committees (UANOC)

Islamic Solidarity Sports Federation (IsSSF)

Note:

The Major Event Organizations marked with ² are also listed among the International Federations as these Major Event Organizations also act as an International Federation governing some sports.

An organization marked with ⁷ is currently declared non-compliant with the Code.

Notes:

The National Olympic Committee marked with ³ also fulfils the responsibility of their country’s National Anti-Doping Organization under Code Article 20.4.6, and, therefore, is also listed among the National Anti-Doping Organizations.

The National Olympic Committee marked with ⁴ covers Paralympic Movement and, therefore, is also listed among National Paralympic Committees.

An organization marked with ⁷ is currently declared non-compliant with the Code.

Notes:

The Organization marked with ⁶ is the National Olympic Committee also fulfilling the responsibility of their country’s National Anti-Doping Organization under Code Article 20.4.6, and, therefore, is also listed among the National Olympic Committees.

(‡) Acts as NADO for Liechtenstein.

An organization marked with ⁷ is currently declared non-compliant with the Code.
